verbose_text: To validate whether our model system is functional for investigating fusion events in the intestine, we firstly demonstrated that the iGFP transgenic locus is active in intestinal epithelial cells, as mice containing a recombined iGFP locus (iGFP x CMV-Cre mice) demonstrated widespread and high expression of GFP in a wide range of tissues including the intestine (XREF_FIG).
